original_text: You have come near to God. But you have not come to a place that you can touch, like Sinai mountain. That mountain burned with fire. But where the people stood, it was completely dark. They could not see at all. There was also a very strong wind and a storm. Israel's people came near to Sinai mountain after they left Egypt. That was where Moses received God's laws for the people. See Exodus 19:10-25; Deuteronomy 4:11-12; 5:22-26. You have come near to God. But you have not come to a place that you can touch, like Sinai mountain. That mountain burned with fire. But where the people stood, it was completely dark. They could not see at all. There was also a very strong wind and a storm.
korean_text: 너희는 만질 수 있고 불이 붙는 산과 침침함과 흑암과 폭풍과

sentences.original_text: You have come near to God.
But you have not come to a place
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 어떤 장소에는 오지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: that you can touch, like Sinai mountain.
sentences.korean_translation: 시내 산처럼 만질 수 있는 곳에는요.

sentences.original_text: But where the people stood, it was completely dark.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사람들이 서 있던 곳은 완전히 어두웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: They could not see at all.
There was also a very strong wind and a storm.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 매우 강한 바람과 폭풍이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Israel's people came near to Sinai mountain
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 시내 산에 가까이 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: That was where Moses received God's laws for the people.
You have come near to God.
But you have not come to a place
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 어떤 장소에는 오지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: that you can touch, like Sinai mountain.
sentences.korean_translation: 시내 산처럼 만질 수 있는 곳에는요.

sentences.original_text: But where the people stood, it was completely dark.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사람들이 서 있던 곳은 완전히 어두웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: They could not see at all.
There was also a very strong wind and a storm.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 매우 강한 바람과 폭풍이 있었습니다.
